page.title: 12Life in Normanby
page.content: We asked the population of our village how long they had lived there.Two families had been in Normanby for less than a year but one person had lived there for 50 years, another for 54 years and one for 72 years.More than half of the families have lived in Normanby for more than 5 years.One family replied,"Our family has lived here for hundreds of years". People were asked why they liked living in Normanby. Most people said that they liked it because it was in the country and others remarked how peaceful it was.One person said they thought it was the best place in the world.When we asked if there were any disadvantages or any things people disliked about living in Normanby most people replied no but a few people mentioned the absence of shops and the heavy lorry traffic.
